mapper.sql: SELECT T1.ROW_ID as id /*记录编号*/ ,t1.created created /*创建时间*/ ,T1.CREATED_BY as createdBy /*创建者ID*/ ,date_format(t1.last_upd, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') lastUpdated /*最后更新时间*/ ,T1.LAST_UPD_BY as lastUpdatedBy /*最后更新者ID*/ ,T1.CORP_ID as corpid /*公司账套*/ ,T1.ORG_ID as orgId /*组织ID*/ ,T1.POSTN_ID postnId /*职位ID*/ ,T1.SEQ as seq /*顺序*/ ,T1.FORWARD_URL as forwardUrl /*点击后的跳转地址*/ ,T1.ACTIVE_FLAG as activeFlag /*有效*/ ,T1.APP_TYPE as appType /*系统类型*/ ,T1.IMG_ID as imgId /*图片ID*/ ,T1.IMG_CODE as imgCode /*编号*/ ,GET_HTTP_PATH('app',T2.ATTACHMENT_PATH) as imgUrl /*图片路径*/
from LNK_SCROLL_IMG T1 left join LNK_ATTACHMENT T2 on T1.IMG_ID=T2.ROW_ID where 1=1 and T1.corp_id=#{usercorpid}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO LNK_SCROLL_IMG( ROW_ID /*记录ID*/ ,SEQ /*顺序*/ ,FORWARD_URL /*点击后的跳转地址*/ ,ACTIVE_FLAG /*有效*/ ,APP_TYPE /*系统类型*/ ,IMG_ID /*图片ID*/ ,IMG_CODE /*编号*/ ) values (
#{id} /*记录ID*/ ,#{seq} /*顺序*/ ,#{forwardUrl} /*点击后的跳转地址*/ ,#{activeFlag} /*有效*/ ,#{appType} /*系统类型*/ ,#{imgId} /*图片ID*/ ,#{id} /*编号*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE LNK_SCROLL_IMG SET SEQ =#{seq} /*顺序*/ ,FORWARD_URL =#{forwardUrl} /*点击后的跳转地址*/ ,ACTIVE_FLAG =#{activeFlag} /*有效*/ WHERE ROW_ID=#{id}
